gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 118, Raptors 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Raptors, 118-103. Thomas Bryant recorded 18 points and 10 rebounds for the Heat, while Jaime Jaquez Jr. added 18 points, four rebounds and five assists in the victory. Gary Trent Jr. tallied 18 points and four rebounds for the Raptors in the losing effort. The Heat finish the regular season at 46-36, while the Raptors finish 25-57.
